text: "Better Now" is a 2018 song by American rapper Post Malone and is the fifth and final single from his second studio album Beerbongs & Bentleys. It went to top 10 single charts in Australia, Austria, Canada, Denmark, Finland, Ireland, New Zealand, Norway, the Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Sweden, the United States and the United Kingdom. It also went to number 11 in Germany and number 12 in Switzerland. Category:2018 songs Category:Post Malone songs
title: Better Now
